products.title: Vector graphics - complete course + projects
products.description: A comprehensive course to master vector graphic design from basics to advanced techniques. Includes hands-on projects to sharpen your skills and bring creative ideas to life. Perfect for beginners and professionals alike!
products.li1: Mastering vector design software.
products.li2: Creating and editing paths, shapes, and curves for precise design.
products.li3: Working with layers and groups to organize and manage complex projects.
products.li4: Applying colors, gradients, and patterns to enhance visual appeal.
products.li5: Using typography and text manipulation for effective communication.
products.li6: Designing logos, icons, and illustrations for various applications.
products.li7: Implementing advanced tools like the Pen tool, Shape Builder, and Pathfinder.
products.li8: Exporting and optimizing designs for both print and web use.

products.title: Photo editing - beginner to expert
products.description: Master the art of photo editing with this step-by-step course. Learn essential tools, techniques, and advanced tips to create stunning images. Suitable for both beginners and those looking to enhance their expertise!
products.li1: Learn how to navigate photo editing software like Photoshop and Lightroom.
products.li2: Understand the basics of color correction and contrast adjustment.
products.li3: Master the use of filters, layers, and blending modes.
products.li4: Learn advanced retouching techniques, such as skin smoothing and object removal.
products.li5: Understand the importance of cropping and composition.
products.li6: Learn how to work with both RAW and JPEG formats.
products.li7: Discover how to enhance photos using curves and levels.
products.li8: Learn how to export and optimize images for various platforms.

products.title: Networking fundamentals for complete beginners
products.description: Learn the basics of computer networking in a simple and easy-to-follow course. Understand key concepts, terminologies, and how networks function. Perfect for anyone starting their journey in networking!

products.li6: Learn the importance of network security and encryption.
products.li7: Gain practical knowledge of setting up a home network.
products.li8: Explore the basics of network administration and configuration.

products.title: The ultimate acrylic painting course

products.li1: Learn the fundamentals of acrylic painting, including tools and materials.
